name: Flatline (itch) (Wolf170, Shrugg32)
description:
A small swarm game made for 2021 GMTK Game Jam. Fend off enemies for as long as possible to gain higher scores. Your health and damage are connected together, the lower health you are, the more damage you'll deal, and vice versa (Controller compatible)

Controls (Please read):

  • Run: a, d / left stick
  • Attack: e / left mouse / X button
  • Jump: space / A button
  • Heal: q / Right Click / B button
